example-card/stripJSDocDescription.description: When `true` the JSDoc above the default export will be stripped from displayed source code in the script tab.

example-card/iframe.description: If you want to host the actual example that's being rendered somewhere else and render it via iframe instead -- to be able to isolate all CSS -- you can do this by passing the iframe URL.

example-card/iframeHeight.description: The height you want to pass to the iframe. If pixels it must include 'px'.

example-section/title.description: By default the filename is shown as title above the example. Can be overwritten with the title prop.

example-section/hideTitle.description: By default a title is shown above the example. Can be hidden with hideTitle.

example-section/iframe.description: If you want to host the actual example that's being rendered somewhere else and render it via iframe instead -- to be able to isolate all CSS -- you can do this by passing the iframe URL.

example-section/iframeHeight.description: The height you want to pass to the iframe. If pixels it must include 'px'.
